SPECIAL - 75% OFF FIRST MONTH + DOUBLE RAM & DOUBLE DISK SPACE!

Coupon code: FALL2K10
Use on checkout in coupon redemption field. Open a ticket with sales after your VPS has been provisioned requesting your double disk & double RAM upgrade.

RESTRICTIONS:
Offer good on all NEW VPS plans!

ZipServers offers SUPERIOR Managed Virtual Servers and Technical Support:
x Virtuozzo based VPS
x Virtual VPS Firewalls!
x Minimum Dual Processor Quad or Hex Core (8 or 12 CPU)
x cPanel, Plesk, Direct Admin include hardening during provisioning.
x Full root access
x Custom rDNS and SWIP upon request
x Customer Control Panel allows FREE use of our geographically diverse and 100% AUTOMATED DNS system
x ZipSafe (TM) Backups performed each day
x Ping Monitoring for ALL VPS's
x VPN Private Network (VPN featuring SSL, IPSEC, or PPTP depending on locale)
x VPS-to-VPS Private Networking Connections w/multiple plans!
x Earn ZipRewards good towards Hosting credits!
x PayPal, Visa, AMEX, Discover and MasterCard happily accepted
